title: Squaremile777
author: Squaremile777
content: Hi, all Im crypto instutional person Instutional means Im all about , whales Fed wall Street Banks,funds.Also i read MA and MACD. Im inspired by Banks and investing and money flow inspired by City of London (square mile one of the wealthiest square in the world) money power i have learned all about this subject.Crypto is future soon the world Will be tokenized.I have learned one thing dont follow the words but look the actions.Im looking for other people who knows same things to connect.Before i was blind i was looking for the wrong sources of information but now i follow the correct information.So Im " instutiononal not retail" Perhaps we can do some good crypto projects together here also who knows.

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: Your writing level is quite high for the average newbie, let's get things straight.You're a person from an institution with some trading background. You're interested in creating a crypto project based on some inspiration. What kind of project would you like to start and what criteria would you need someone for?

comments.author: AbuBhakar
comments.body: You should define tour exact agenda here on why you would like to connect on same peers like you to save time from inquiring. Are you offering a trading group which user like you will share idea on trading and help each other to become successful or are you asking for an investment opportunity to other people since you are claiming an institutional person which means you have a lot of info for a profitable trade?

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: OP this is a bitcointalk community which has alot of people of different locations and background present, just as tou can see, we are all friendly and in case you're here and interested to learn, this is the perfect ground, you don't need to demand for friendship here because by default everyone is friendly to each other that's why we are also concerned in replying to your thread by engaging in the discussion, but if what you really want is a link up to build a crypto project then you have a long way to go and i will summarize it for you.1. Learn.2. Be active3. Create value4. Start something or get something doing5. Build reputation onbthe forum 6. Have enough capital 7.Â  Create a realistic project8. Make a good presentation of what it's all about9. Request for collaboration on the service board10. Let people have trust in you.

comments.author: ShowOff
comments.body: I'm not sure what exactly you are interested in right now, is it about being a developer or maybe wanting to be one of the donors in a new project or something?I'm not sure about how a potential new project will develop in the long term and will be profitable for the developer. This is a high-risk business because people are starting to realize that new project developers are just using investors' budgets for their own wealth without really caring about long-term project development. But perhaps, you will become one of the most profitable holders if you actually invest in bitcoin instead of being a developer of new projects.

comments.author: KingsDen
comments.body: Quote from: ShowOff on March 02, 2023, 04:25:09 PMI'm not sure what exactly you are interested in right now, is it about being a developer or maybe wanting to be one of the donors in a new project or something?Op said he is an institutional person and not a retail person and also he said maybe he could work together with people here about token because the world will be tokenized very soon.What this means is that OP may be looking for some pump and dump project developers he could work with in order to perform the institutional tricks of whales.I am not that comfortable with the sentence lines of OP, either he is up to rip people or he will fall prey to scammers.

comments.author: Squaremile777
comments.body: Quote from: KingsDen on March 02, 2023, 05:35:28 PMQuote from: ShowOff on March 02, 2023, 04:25:09 PMI'm not sure what exactly you are interested in right now, is it about being a developer or maybe wanting to be one of the donors in a new project or something?Op said he is an institutional person and not a retail person and also he said maybe he could work together with people here about token because the world will be tokenized very soon.What this means is that OP may be looking for some pump and dump project developers he could work with in order to perform the institutional tricks of whales.I am not that comfortable with the sentence lines of OP, either he is up to rip people or he will fall prey to scammers.Im looking for people who knows Same think Same that's the one thing.Not into scams or tricks that's just one time earning no point to build up connections to scam there is many ways to earn money without scam others.I'll look around here maybe share some ideas and let the idea will work out naturally between the sharp minds.And yes world will be tokenized the inclusive capitalism fractionalized ownership.That's the new reality wich way everything moves.The old Legacy Market some of the fundamentals will stay but many of the ways will be changing.To speak about future binance start offering tokenized shares stocks and so.One thing what i see getting big is staking Im interested something about staking.
